name: Ala
description:
The forest is damaged every day: trash, accidents, ...
You are a tree deity, you have to repair damaged ecosystems by humans.
But beware, you should only operate at night so as not to be seen.

Note: I had the concept idea during the global game jam 2020. In Malagasy (native language of Madagascar), "Ala" means forest. Today, 02022020: Feb. 2 is palindrome day and Ala is also a palindrome.

Credits:

Thanks to Nomyn for the music
Thanks to Triforge for the tree model

Note: actually, it's just a playable prototybe without lose and win conditions.
